Summary: two bright light in sky no sound
trends: There have been no other sightings in Leroy
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailson the date listed i was taking out trash and looked upward and notice two very very bright lights in the sky coming from the southwest. as the objects approached they went in different directions.one went to teh north west and teh other went northeast right over me both were no more than 1\3 mile from me .they moved very fast and made no sound what so ever.this is not the first time i have noticed things in the sky. on july 4 2010.wile outside around 7-8 pm i noticed a triangle shape object about the trees with blue lights around it. it aslo made no sound. one minute it was ther and the next it was gone. i don't have a clue what these lights was.,but the thing i do know is the object from both sighting made no sound and was very fast.
